As requested by Gordon Mohr I'm posting this bug report here.
I'm getting t=
he above error message after crawling 
79333 URIs (for ~50mins) with curren=
tly 401922 queued. Once this alert
occures, the currnent job is paused, and=
 I have to manually Resume the
job from the web interface (upon which it ru=
ns for another couple of
minutes before encountering the same issue again).=
 
Btw. Starting heritrix with 512MB or 1G Heap sizes only helps in a way
th=
at it takes longer until the OOME occures, i.e. ~3hrs with 1G heap,
but it =
still happens)

The seed file I'm using (random.urls) has 1842 seeds in it.=


Since Gordon said that crawls of this size should not be a problem at
all=
 I'm wondering what I might be doing wrong.

If you need more information t=
han what is below I'm glad to provide it.

cheers
--pm
